Considerations on a book, entituled The theory of the earth, publisht some years since by the Dr. Burnet Beaumont, John, d. 1731.
[8], 187 p.
Printed for the author, and are to be sold by Randal Taylor ..., London : 1693.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library. Attributed to John Beaumont. cf. NUC pre-1956. Errata, advertisement: p. [8]
